title: Wintergreen Essential Oil
description: Wintergreen is one of the most popular aromas used in scenting and flavoring everything from chewing gum (Do not ingest this oil!) to hair care products. The uplifting and sweet scent is refreshing to many and is used in a variety of ways, including products for sore muscles, skin care and purely aromatic reasons.
